titlestmt.titleproper: A Guide to the Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, RG 2 FA1588

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using ArchivesSpace on 2020-09-12 16:49:26 -0400.

did.unittitle: Rockefeller Brothers Fund records, President, RG 2

scopecontent.head: Scope and Contents
scopecontent.p: Contains the papers and office files of past presidents of the Rockefeller Brothers Fund.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Information regarding the Rockefeller Archive Center's preferred elements and forms of citation can be found at http://www.rockarch.org/research/citations.php

accessrestrict.head: Conditions Governing Access
accessrestrict.p: Open for research with select materials restricted as noted. Brittle or damaged items are available at the discretion of RAC. Researchers interested in accessing digital media (floppy disks, CDs, DVDs, etc.) or audiovisual material (audio cassettes, VHS, etc.) in this collection must use an access surrogate. The original items may not be accessed because of preservation concerns. To request an access surrogate be made, or if you are unsure if there is an access surrogate, please contact an archivist.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: President, William M. Dietel papers, RG 2, Series 1 (FA774). President, Colin G. Campbell papers, RG 2, Series 2 (FA1300).
Additional finding aids are created as records are processed and open for research.
